feed.title: Chris Prather’s Developer Journal
feed.subtitle: Play area for thoughts and code snippets

entry.title: Fate of Xamarin
entry.content:
I read some of the highlights from the Microsoft Build Keynote at Syncfusion Blog.

I think this is ultimately a good thing for the future of UI development in .Net but I wonder what argument would be compelling for new developers to pick up Xamarin for the first time over next year knowing the .Net Team is transitioning to .Net Maui.
entry.summary: I read some of the highlights from the Microsoft Build Keynote at Syncfusion Blog.

entry.title: Welcome to Chris Prather’s Developer Journal!

link.title: Welcome to Chris Prather’s Developer Journal!

entry.content:
Welcome to Chris Prather’s Developer Journal.

I have wanted to create a place for me to store thoughts and code snippets. So I can see them later and remember where I have been on my journey as a Developer.
entry.summary: Welcome to Chris Prather’s Developer Journal.
